narrative:
No non-compliant items identified during this inspection.
This second pre-license inspection for a class "C" license and exit briefing were conducted with the secretary.
Submit the appropriate license fee to the Regional Office.
Conducting regulated activities without a valid USDA license is a violation of the Animal Welfare Act.
